thread.section_title: Hotel Wales - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Old World Charm
thread.title_full: Old World Charm - Review of Hotel Wales, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: cldwlkrmom
title: Old World Charm
text: From the moment we pulled up to the entrance we were treated like their favorite guests...and it was the first time we stayed at the Hotel Wales! Parking is Valet and Muhammed was the best making sure all of our belongings, vehicle and our party were well taken care. Check in was warm, welcoming and easy, our rooms were ready early so we were able to check in just after noon. Rooms were the typical NYC size but very clean and very pretty with crisp white linens. Bathroom offered a Rain Shower Head and a hand held shower....we had a great stay and will use again!
